alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Randolph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 10:57PM EST until January 02 at 9:58AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues or the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Lafayette down to Riverton. Mississinewa River at Ridgeville. .Antecedent soil moisture...and upwards of an additional one and a half inches of rainfall this weekend...has returned several rivers to flood. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water on the shoulder and edge of SR 1 south of the junction with SR 28 in western Randolph County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 PM EST Saturday was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 6.2 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Sunday.
